name: Figma Component Code Connect
description: Check if UI component should be connected to Figma design when created or updated

then.prompt: A component file was just edited. Ask the user if they would like to connect this code to a Figma component. If the user approves: first run the get_code_connect_map tool for the last Figma URL provided by the user (prompt them to provide it if unavailable). If the response is empty, run the add_code_connect_map tool to create the mapping. If a mapping already exists, inform the user. If the user declines: do nothing.
